post.title: Nginx Reverse Proxy and Vite Server Performance Boost
post.description: Optimize your web application's performance with this guide on configuring Nginx as a reverse proxy for your Vite server. Learn how to tweak connection timeouts, play with HTTP versions, and enable caching to significantly boost page loading speeds. Say goodbye to slow loading times and hello to a faster, smoother user experience!
